com.futuresailors.battleships.model

Class Ship

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.futuresailors.battleships.model.Ship

  • public class Ship
extends java.lang.Object
    This object represents a ship on the board and its respective tiles. It also contains the ships icons file path and methods that change the state of the ship in the game.
    Author:
    Joe Baldwin, Michael Conroy

        Checks if the opponent scored a hit on a ships tile.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
